markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Diobel Pearl Diver](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=58)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Absalom and Starstone Isle

</column>

You spent a portion of your youth diving and gathering precious pearls under the attentive eyes of Kortos Consortium merchants.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Dexterity, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, and the [Ocean Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Underwater Marauder](/Feats.aspx?ID=858) skill feat.
name: Diobel Pearl Diver

summary_markdown: You spent a portion of your youth diving and gathering precious pearls under the attentive eyes of Kortos Consortium merchants.
text: Diobel Pearl Diver Source World Guide pg. 22 2.0 Region Absalom and Starstone Isle You spent a portion of your youth diving and gathering precious pearls under the attentive eyes of Kortos Consortium merchants. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution or Dexterity, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Athletics skill, and the Ocean Lore skill. You gain the Underwater Marauder skill feat.
